articles.title: Inside Shilpa Shetty’s daughter Samisha’s birthday bash: Raqesh Bapat feeds her cake, Shamita Shetty gives a hug - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shilpa Shetty and Raj Kundra celebrated Samisha's birthday on Tuesday. Their son Viaan, Shamita Shetty, Raqesh Bapat and Sunanda Shetty also attended the celebrations. Check out the pictures here. | Bollywood
articles.content: Actor Shilpa Shetty and her husband Raj Kundra celebrated the second birthday of their daughter Samisha on Tuesday. Apart from Shilpa, Raj and their nine-year-old son Viaan, Shamita Shetty, Raqesh Ba… [+2382 chars]

articles.title: Alia Bhatt reacts to viewers finding ‘reflection of’ Kangana Ranaut in her Gangubai Kathiawadi performance - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Alia Bhatt reacted to a compliment likening her performance in Gangubai Kathiawadi to National Award-winning actors Kangana Ranaut and Vidya Balan. | Bollywood
